description: In a city that has its fair share of roof-garden eateries, this restaurant stands out as one of the most popular with fine panoramic views that take in the Castel dell'Ovo, Capri, the Sorrentine ...
creditCards: American Express credit card, China UnionPay, Credit card / Debit card accepted, Diners Club credit card, Discover Card, JCB, Maestro, Mastercard credit card, Visa credit card
